message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but $180 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only afford to pay up to $60.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $140.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $140 is still more than I can spend.  How about we split the difference between our previous offers? I could do $100.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but $100 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I can offer it to you for $120.
Alice, it seems like we are getting closer. How about $110 for the product? That's the highest I can go.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130, but that's as low as I can go.
